Troubleshoot Kubelet issue
----------------------

Node not Ready
-------------------------

service kubelet status

journalctl -u kubelet

which kubelet
ls -l /usr/bin/kubelet

service kubelet status
cat /usr/lib/systemd/system/kubelet.service.d/10-kubeadm.conf

set proper executable path to this file

sudo systemctl daemon-reload
sudo systemctl restart kubelet

Troubleshoot Kubectl Connection issue
-------------------------------------

k get Node

k cluster-info

cat ~/.kube/config
[copy certificate-authority-data]

echo  | base64 --decode

[match the value with]

sudo cat /etc/kubernetes/pki/ca.crt

kubectl config view
[check server ip]
